segments.text: The faucet's been left on, and now the sink is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman just stands there, drying a stupid plate, ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked soon from that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kidsâ€”climbing on an unstable stool like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's grabbing cookies, risking a fall right onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encourages him, hand out begging for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they be so reckless in a slippery kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is calm, but this interior is a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this nonsense immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's damaging the cabinets, and dishes could shatter everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming at the carelessness on display here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors just frame their disobedience perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene boils my blood.
segments.speaker: PAR
